name: Illumio
description: Creates Threat Exchange IoCs from workloads on the Illumio PCE within a configured policy scope.

configuration.label: PCE URL
configuration.description: PCE FQDN with optional method prefix - e.g. https://my.pce.com

configuration.label: PCE Port Number
configuration.description: PCE port number - use 443 for SaaS instances

configuration.label: Label Scope
configuration.description: One or more label key/value pairs that make up the policy scope for threat workloads. Must be of the format key1:value1,key2:value2,...
